pr_title: Ensure LTPA Keys are created before hitting https endpoint

timeline.message: Ensure LTPA Keys are created before hitting https endpoint

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason to keep this instead of changing to waitForSecurityPrerequisites(serverEDF6, 60000);?
timeline.author: fmhwong

replies.bodyText: waitForSecurityPrerequisites checks for creation of LTPA keys but we don't need to as that was already created in the previous test case. They use the same server so the key only gets created onces, but we still need to check for the defaultHttpEndpoint-ssl message.
replies.author: lamkavan

timeline.message: Ensure that order of execution does not effect behaviour
